participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: creative and enthusiastic, always looking for opportunities to express herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: I have been in the wedding planning business for four years now. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job. I exercise every day. I drive a bmw. I've been working on my farm for over 20 years.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: laid-back and humorous, enjoys spending time at home but is curious about new experiences.
participant_2.background: I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger. My memories of my family are the most valuable thing I own. I ride my bicycle to work. I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors. I visit comic con.

content.text: Good, good! Just got back from comic-con! How about you?
Oh fun! I've never been to one, but I've always wanted to go. I work in the wedding planning business, and I'm really excited for a wedding I'm working on this weekend.
That sounds awesome! I'm a huge couch potato, I love to just relax and watch TV. My favorite show is Jimmy Fallon.
I love Jimmy Fallon too! I also love music, I play the guitar and sing. I'm trying to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
That's so cool! I wish I could play an instrument. I love to sing, but I'm not very good at it.
Hey, it's all about having fun! I'm sure you're a great singer!
Thanks! I'm always looking for a reason to get out of the house, but I don't know what to do. Do you have any suggestions?
Yeah, I ride my bike to work. It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds like a great idea! I'll have to try that.
Awesome! I hope you have a great time.
